plot: A detective is 'set-up', and murdered. Two Angels in the 'Afterlife' allow him to return to earth, track down his killers, and discover the truth.
title: The Avenging Spirit
plot_es: A detective is 'set-up', and murdered. Two Angels in the 'Afterlife' allow him to return to earth, track down his killers, and discover the truth.
plot_en: A detective is 'set-up', and murdered. Two Angels in the 'Afterlife' allow him to return to earth, track down his killers, and discover the truth.
